commit message: Updated .po and .pot files
We shouldn't be checking the error message for sqlite constraint exceptions--different phones do it differently

Use most conservative memory setting for swipe between lists, update ab test identifier
Fixed a potential null pointer when calling updateTimer
Fixed a bug with featured list fragment on tablets
Don't show filter images on the nook since they have a crazy bug
New layout for the task adapter row (task_adapter_row_simple). Need to A/B test
Polish, ab test, and preference for row style
Respect show full task title setting even in simple view
Fixed case sensitivity issues with tags in title parser
Record statistics for some preference changes
Don't show emergent tags in row, fixed not in any list filter to not count emergent tags
Fixed reverse sort not working
Localized strings in the addon activity
Fixed backwards settings descriptions
Fixed some layout issues with the new task row design
Remove more unsupported nook settings
Fixed a crash in preferences
AB test advanced edit screen
String capitalization updates
Don't display errors in ideas tab
No more of this crazy custom filter nonsense when assigning a task
